snippet: In London’s diverse Brixton neighborhood, Michael Donkor, a teacher, describes his style as smart with a playful edge.
abstract: English Literature teacher Michael Donkor, who resides in diverse Brixton neighborhood in London, describes his fashion style as smart with playful edge.
